definitions.definition: an act of describing or identifying something precisely or of stating a precise requirement.
examples: give a full specification of the job advertised

definitions.definition: a detailed description of the design and materials used to make something.
examples: instructions, guidelines, parameters, stipulations, requirements, conditions, provisions, restrictions, order; Moredescription, details; informalspecs "a shelter built to their specifications"Moredescription, details; specs a shelter built to their specifications

definitions.definition: a standard of workmanship, materials, etc., required to be met in a piece of work.
examples: everything was built to a higher specification

definitions.definition: a description of an invention accompanying an application for a patent.
